1b1('bum): bam po brgya
1b2('bum): gya dgu pa/ / / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang da ltar rtogs pa ni//
1b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
2a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// /
2a2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ gang de ltar rtogs pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
2a3('bum): chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam
2a4('bum): pa shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
2b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ tshu rol gyi 'gram mam/ pha rol gyi 'gram mam/ gnyis kyi dbus
2b2('bum): na mi gnas na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shA rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
2b3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/
2b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshu rol gyi 'gram mam/ pha
2b5('bum): rol gyi 'gram mam/ gnyis ka'i dbus na mi gnas shing / shin tu rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
3a1('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
3a2('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dmigs pa'i
3a3('bum): tshul du 'du shes su bgyid pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ba'o//
3a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor legs so legs so// rab 'byor de ni ming du yang chags
3a5('bum): pa yin/ mtshan mar yang chags pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na ming du yang chags shing / mtshan mar yang chags
3a6('bum): pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
3b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ming du 'dzin tam/ mtshan mar 'dzin na de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ming dang mtshan mar 'dzin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pas/
3b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ngo // rab 'byor gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes
3b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan mar 'dzin cing / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan mar gzung nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed na/ de shes rab kyi pha
3b4('bum): rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du
3b5('bum): spong ngo / / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang de ltar legs par bshad
3b6('bum): cing / legs par bstan la/ chags pa dang ma chags pa de dag kyang mchis pa ngo mtshar che'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di
3b7('bum): skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chags pa ni gang yin/ ma chags pa ni gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
4a1('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thabs mkhas pas/ gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na
4a2('bum): chags pa'o/ / tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'du shes stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'du byed stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam
4a3('bum): par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / mig stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rna ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sna stong pa zhes bya bar
4a4('bum): 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / lce stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lus stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// yid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// gzugs
4a5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / sgra stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dri stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// ro stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// /
4a6('bum): reg stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// chos stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rna ba'i rnam
4a7('bum): par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// /
4b1('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar
4b2('bum): 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa
4b3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//
4b4('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sna'i
4b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te
4b6('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sa'i khams stong pa zhes
4b7('bum): bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / chu'i khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// me'i khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rlung gi khams stong pa zhes bya
5a1('bum): par 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / nam mkha'i khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// /
5a2('bum): ma rig pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'du byed stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// ming dang gzugs
5a3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes ma chags pa'o/ / skye mched drug stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar
5a4('bum): 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / sred pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// len pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// srid pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//
5a5('bum): skye ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rga shi stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshul khrims
5a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya/
5a7('bum): bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// nang
5b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid sdong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// stong pa nyid/
5b2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags
5b3('bum): pa'o/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
5b4('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
5b5('bum): chags pa'o/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
5b6('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na
5b7('bum): chags pa'o/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag
6a1('bum): pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams spong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa zhes
6a2('bum): bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / dbang po rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// stobs rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa
6a3('bum): zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na
6a4('bum): chags pa'o/ / bsam gtan rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshad med pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa zhes
6a5('bum): bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / rnam par thar pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam par
6a6('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams
6a7('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mi
6b1('bum): 'jigs pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// byams pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chag/
6b2('bum): pa'o// snying rje chen po stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong
6b3('bum): bapa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//
6b4('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rang byang chub stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam pa thams
6b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
6b6('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// da ltar
6b7('bum): byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
7a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul du sems dang po bskyed pa nye bar bzung ba nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags
7a2('bum): pa'o/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// shes
7a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o/ / nang stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// stong pa nyid s+ho//
7a4('bum): pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// 'dus ma byas
7a5('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la
7a6('bum): spyod na chags pa'o/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// mi dmigs pa
7a7('bum): stong pa nyid la spong na chags pa'o/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags
7b1('bum): pa'o/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// dbang po rnams la
7b2('bum): spyod na chags pa'o/ / stobs rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod na chags pa'o//
7b3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// bsam gtan rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// tshad med pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
7b4('bum): la spyod na chags pa'o/ / rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
7b5('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod na chags pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
7b6('bum): spyod na chags pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod na chags
7b7('bum): pa'o/ / byams pa chen po la spyod na chags pa'o// snying rje chen po la spyod na chags pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod na chags pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i
8a1('bum): 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o// dgra bcom pa
8a2('bum): nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ / rang byang chub la spyod na chags pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// /
8a3('bum): / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams kyi chags pa med pa gang zhes
8a4('bum): zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzugs la gzugs
8a5('bum): zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / tshor ba la tshor ba zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'du shes la 'du shes zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'du byed la 'du byed ces bya bar 'du
8a6('bum): shes pa med do/ / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// ma 'ongs
8a7('bum): pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
8b1('bum): ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di snyam du/ bdag gis sbyin pa zhig sbyin no// 'di la sbyin pa zhig
8b2('bum): sbyin no/ / sbyin pa 'di lta bu zhig sbyin no zhe'am/ bdag gis ni tshul khrims shig bsrung ngo // tshul khrims 'di lta bu zhig bsrung ngo zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni bzod pa zhig bsgom
8b3('bum): maumo/ bzod pa 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe'am/ bdag gis ni brtson 'grus shig brtsam mo// brtson 'grus 'di lta bu zhig brtsam mo zhe'am/ bdag gis ni bsam gtan la
8b4('bum): mnyam par gzhag go/ bsam gtan 'di lta ba zhig la mnyam par gzhag go zhe'am/ bdag gis ni shes rab cig bsgom mo// shes rab 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe 'am/ bdag
8b5('bum): gis ni bsod nams shig bskyed do/ / bsod nams 'di lta bu zhig bskyed do// bsod nams 'di tsam zhig bskyed de zhe'am/ bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud
8b6('bum): par bya'o/ / bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o// bdag gis ni sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
8b7('bum): par bya'o snyam du sems pa med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam
9a1('bum): par rtog pa de lta bu thams cad/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang
9a2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang
9a3('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos
9a4('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir med cing mi rgyu ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu// de dag ni byang chub
9a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chags pa med pa dag go/ / / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
9a6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi
9a7('bum): chags par 'gyur ba yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i
9b1('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos sems su 'du shes pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang
9b2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
9b3('bum): rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
9b4('bum): du 'du shes pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong
9b5('bum): pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /
9b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /
9b7('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su
10a1('bum): 'du shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / dbang po rnams su 'du shes pa dang
10a2('bum): stobs rnams su 'du shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su 'du shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par 'du shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su
10a3('bum): 'du shes pa dang / bsam gtan rnams su 'du shes pa dang / tshad med pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang /
10a4('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
10a5('bum): smon pa med par 'du shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams su 'du shes pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams su 'du shes pa dang /
10a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su 'du shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / byams pa chen por
10a7('bum): 'du shes pa dang / snying rje chen por 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su 'du shes par
10b1('bum): gyur te/ sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag tu 'du shes nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mngon par bsdus te/ gcig tu brtul nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
10b2('bum): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing yongs su bsngo ba der yang 'du shes pa de dag ni/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags
10b3('bum): pa ste/ chags pa de dag la chags par gyur na/ chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni ko'u shi ka gzugs
10b4('bum): kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// 'du shes kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// 'du byed kyi rang bzhin
10b5('bum): yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// mig gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rna ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar
10b6('bum): mi nus so/ / sna'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// lce'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// lus kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// yid kyi rang bzhin yongs
10b7('bum): su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// sgra'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// dri'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//
11a1('bum): ro'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// reg gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// chos kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// mig
11a2('bum): gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo/
11a3('bum): bar mi nus so// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// yid kyi rnam par shes
11a4('bum): pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//
11a5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su
11a6('bum): bsngo bar mi nus so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//
11a7('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// lce'i 'dus
11b1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
11b2('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//
11b3('bum): me'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//
11b4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// ma rig pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// 'du byed kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//
11b5('bum): par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// skye mched drug gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//
11b6('bum): reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// sred pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// len pa'i rang bzhin yongs
11b7('bum): su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / srid pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// skye ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rga shi'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//
12a1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// bzod pa'i pha
12a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs
12a3('bum): su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi
12a4('bum): rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// chen
12a5('bum): po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar
12a6('bum): mi nus so/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// thog ma dang tha ma med
12a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar
12b1('bum): mi nus so/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// mi dmigs pa stong pa//
12b2('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi
12b3('bum): nus so/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi rus so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// yang
12b4('bum): dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs
12b5('bum): su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// 'phags pa'i
12b6('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin
12b7('bum): yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar
13a1('bum): mi nus so/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin yongs su
13a2('bum): bsngo bar mi nus so/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// mngon par shes pa rnams
13a3('bum): kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//
13a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// so so yang dag par rig
13a5('bum): pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//
13a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// lan cig phyir
13a7('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su
13b1('bum): bsngo bar mi nus so/ / rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
13b2('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ / ko'u shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gzhan zhig bla na med pa yang dag par
13b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan tam/ yang dag par bskul lam/ yang dag par spro ba bskyed dam/ yang dag par dga' bar bya na/ yang dag par rjes su
13b4('bum): song ba'i yid kyis/ gzhan yang dag par bstan par bya'o// yang dag par bskul bar bya'o// yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o// yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o//
13b5('bum): de yang ci nas kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
13b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/
13b7('bum): bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha
14a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bsam gtam gyi
14a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar
14a3('bum): rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i
14a4('bum): tshe/ bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam
14a5('bum): par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / chen po stong
14a6('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni chen po stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni don dam
14a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam
14b1('bum): rga par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mtha'
14b2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa
14b3('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/
14b4('bum): bdag ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod do/
14b5('bum): zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par
14b6('bum): mi 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong
14b7('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mi dmigs pa stong po nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni
15a1('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni ngo bo nyid stod pa
15a2('bum): nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes
15a3('bum): bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur
15a4('bum): ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
15a5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dbang po rnams la spyod
15a6('bum): dongo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni stobs rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub
15a7('bum): kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
15b1('bum): spod pa'i tshebadag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe8/
15b2('bum): ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la spyod do zhes bya
15b3('bum): bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni tshad med pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / gzugs med
15b4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par
15b5('bum): thar pa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i
15b6('bum): tshe/ bdag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma rmed pa
15b7('bum): dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur
16a1('bum): ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / ting nge
16a2('bum): 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni gzungs
16a3('bum): kyi sgo rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la
16a4('bum): spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang /
16a5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa'i
16a6('bum): tshebadag ni byams pa chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni snying rje chen po la spong do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog
16a7('bum): par mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi
16b1('bum): 'gyur ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
16b2('bum): 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/
16b3('bum): bdag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar
16b4('bum): rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang byang chub la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la
16b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam pa tham
16b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ / yang dag par bskul bar bya'o// yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o// yang
16b7('bum): dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos gzhan bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan par bya'o// yang
17a1('bum): dag par bskul bar bya'o/ / yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o// yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o// de yang dag par bstan pa de dang / yang dag par bskul
17a2('bum): bde dang / yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya ba de dang / yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ba des/ gzhan yang dag par ston cing / yang dag par skul ba dang / yang dag par spro
17a3('bum): bskyed cing / yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i tshe/ rma 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par bskul bas yang dag par bskul ba yin te/ de ltar
17a4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
17a5('bum): brgya pa bam po brgya dgu bcu pa/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor de ltar khyod byang chub sems
17a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dag ston pa legaso legasaso/ / rab 'byor de bas na khyod la chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba dag bstan par byas
17a7('bum): de dag shin tu legs par nyon la yid la yid la zung zhig dang bstan par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to//
17b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs/
17b2('bum): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar yid la byed na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar gyur pa de srid du chags pa'o// gang yang 'das pa dang / ma
17b3('bum): byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chags pa thams cang dang bral ba de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i
17b4('bum): chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de thams cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing / yid la byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na
17b5('bum): rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o/ / gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de dag dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams kyi dge ba'i
17b6('bum): rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mtshan mar byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam
17b7('bum): du chags pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma
18a1('bum): yin no/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad
18a2('bum): rang bzhin gyis rnam par dben pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
18a3('bum): 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma byas/ mngon par 'du ma byas pa ste/ su yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ de ni sus kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya bar mi
18a4('bum): nus so/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos kyi rang
18a5('bum): bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te/ rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do// rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin gcig pu gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no// gang rang bzhin ma
18a6('bum): yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o/ / gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par 'du ma byas pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi rang bzhin gcig pu rang bzhin
18a7('bum): ma yin pa/ ma byas pa/ mngon par 'du ma byas pa shes na chags pa'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
18b1('bum): phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong / ma thos/ ma rtogs//
18b2('bum): rnam par ma shes/ mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// bcom
18b3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems kyis ma shes so// gzugs kyis ma shes so// tshor bas ma shes so// 'du shes kyis ma shes so// 'du
18b4('bum): byed kyis ma shes so/ / rnam par shes pas ma shes so// mig gis ma shes so// rnabs ma shes so// snas ma shes so// ldes ma shes so// lus kyis ma shes so// yid
18b5('bum): kyis ma shes so/ / gzugs kyis ma shes so// sgras ma shes so// dris ma shes so// ros ma shes so// reg gis ma shes so// chos kyis ma shes so// mig gi rnam par
18b6('bum): shes pas ma shes so/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so// sna'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so// lce'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so// lus kyi rnam par shes pas
18b7('bum): ma shes so/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma shes so// mig gi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so//
19a1('bum): lce'i bdus te reg pas ma shes so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
19a2('bum): bsam shes so/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas
19a3('bum): ma shes so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so// sa'i khams kyis ma shes so// chu'i
19a4('bum): khams kyis ma shes so/ / me'i khams kyis ma shes so// rlung gi khams kyis ma shes so// nam mkha'i khams kyis ma shes so// rnam par shes pa'i khams
19a5('bum): kyis ma shes so/ / ma rig pas ma shes so// 'du byed kyis ma shes so// rnam par shes pas ma shes so// ming dang gzugs kyis ma shes
19a6('bum): so/ / skye mched drug gis ma shes so// reg pas ma shes so// tshor bas ma shes so// sred pas ma shes so// len pas ma shes so// srid pas ma shes so// skye bas ma shes so//
19a7('bum): rga shis ma shes so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// brtson 'grus kyi pha
19b1('bum): rol tu phyin pas ma shes so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// nang stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma shes
19b2('bum): so/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// 'dus byas stong pa
19b3('bum): nyid kyis ma shes so/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// dor ba
19b4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// mi
19b5('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so//
19b6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma shes so// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis ma shes so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma shes so// dbang po rnams kyis ma shes so//
19b7('bum): stobs rnams kyis ma shes so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma shes so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma shes so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma shes so// /
20a1('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyis ma shes so// tshad med pa rnams kyis ma shes so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma shes so// rnam par thar
20a2('bum): pab brgyad kyis ma shes so/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus ma shes so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas ma
20a3('bum): shes so/ / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma shes so// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma shes so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus ma shes so//
20a4('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis ma shes so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis ma shes so// byams pa chen pos ma shes so// snying rje chen pos ma shes so// sangs rgyas kyi chos
20a5('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma shes so/ / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus pa shes so// lam rig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma shes so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma shes so// dgra
20a6('bum): bcom pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ / rang byang chub kyis ma shes so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma shes so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol
20a7('bum): tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu brgyad do/ / // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
20b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyid pa ma mchis pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhim du gzugs mi dmigs
20b2('bum): pa dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'du shes mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / mig mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba mi dmigs pa dang /
20b3('bum): sna mi dmigs pa dang / lce mi dmigs pa dang / lus mi dmigs pa dang / yid mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa dang / sgra mi dmigs pa dang / dri mi dmigs pa dang / ro mi
20b4('bum): dmigs pa dang / reg mi dmigs pa dang / chos mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mi
20b5('bum): dmigs pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs
20b6('bum): pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / yid
20b7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg
21a1('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / sde'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pad+ma
21a2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / sa'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / chu'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / me'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / rlung gi khams mi dmigs/
21a3('bum): pa dang / nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / ma rig pa mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmig
21a4('bum): pa dang / ming dang gzugs mi dmigs pa dang / skye mched drug mi dmigs pa dang / reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa dang / len pa mi dmigs pa dang /
21a5('bum): srid pa mi dmigs pa dang / skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rga shi mi dmigs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang /
21a6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
21a7('bum): pa mi dmigs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / chen po
21b1('bum): stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa
21b2('bum): stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / chos tham
21b3('bum): cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang /
21b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi dmigs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba mi dmigs pa dang /
21b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mi dmigs pa dang / dbang po mi dmigs pa dang / stobs mi dmigs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag mi dmigs pa dang // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs
21b6('bum): pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan mi dmigs pa dang / tshad med pa mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mi dmigs pa dang /
21b7('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad mi dmigs pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
22a1('bum): pa med pa mi dmigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin mi dmigs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo mi dmigs pa dang // de bzhin gshegs
22a2('bum): pa'i stobs mi dmigs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa mi dmigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mi dmigs pa dang / byams pa chen po mi dmigs pa dang / snying rje chen po ma dmigs pa
22a3('bum): dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa dang / / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
22a4('bum): 'bras bu mi dmigs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rang byang chub mi dmigs pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs
22a5('bum): pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rnam pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bcom
22a6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
22a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug
22b1('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ro// gal te gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdug med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
22b2('bum): ngodongo/ / gal te gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba
22b3('bum): 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs med do// gal te tshor ba la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
22b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal
22b5('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
22b6('bum): gal te tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/
22b7('bum): sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam// bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba med do// gal te 'du shes la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
23a1('bum): smod do/ / gal te 'du shes rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes bde zhes bya ba 'am
23a2('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
23a3('bum): pa la spod do/ / gal te 'du shes sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/
23a4('bum): bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'du shes med do// gal te 'du byed la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi
23a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te 'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed bde zhes bya ba 'am
23a6('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
23a7('bum): spyod do/ / gal te 'du byed sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba
23b1('bum): 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'du byed med do// gal te rnam par shes pa la mi spyod ma/ shes rab kyi
23b2('bum): papha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba
23b3('bum): 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
23b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/
23b5('bum): mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa med do// gal te mig la mi sbyor
23b6('bum): na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngo // gal te mig bde zhes bya ba 'am
23b7('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ngo // gal te mig bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
24a1('bum): gal te mig sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa'am/
24a2('bum): bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mig med do// gal te rna ba la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
24a3('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rna ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya
24a4('bum): bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba sdug ce
24a5('bum): bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med
24a6('bum): pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba med do// gal te sna la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya
24a7('bum): bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna bdas
24b1('bum): ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
24b2('bum): pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta
24b3('bum): bu'i snga med do/ / gal te lce la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
24b4('bum): do/ / gal te lce bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/
24b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am
24b6('bum): mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lce med do// gal te lus la mi spyod na/ shes rab
24b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te lus rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug
25a1('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
25a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te lus sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa
25a3('bum): 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus med do// gal te yid la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi
25a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te yid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal
25a5('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te
25a6('bum): yid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug
25a7('bum): bsngal ba 'am bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid med do// gal te gzugs la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
25b1('bum): gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod
25b2('bum): na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs sdug ces
25b3('bum): bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/
25b4('bum): bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs med do// gal te sgra la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sgra rtag ces bya ba 'am/
25b5('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sgra bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
25b6('bum): gal te sgra bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong do// gal te sgra sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
25b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta
26a1('bum): su'i sgra med do/ / gal te dri la mi spyod na// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dri rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
26a2('bum): byin pa la spyod do/ / gal te dri ba de zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dri bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba
26a3('bum): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dri sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
26a4('bum): rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dri med do// gal te ro la mi
26a5('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ro rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ro bde zhes bya ba 'am/
26a6('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ro bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
26a7('bum): gal te ro sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug
26b1('bum): bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ro med do// gal te reg la mi spyor na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
26b2('bum): te reg rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngo do// gal te reg bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab
26b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te reg bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te reg sdug ces bya ba
26b4('bum): 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am
26b5('bum): bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i reg med do// gal te chos la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos
26b6('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
26b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te chos bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos sdug ces
27a1('bum): bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am
27a2('bum): sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos med do// gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/ shes
27a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi
27a4('bum): rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces
27a5('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
27a6('bum): de ci'i phyir sem/ gang dag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mig gi rnas
27a7('bum): bar shes pa med do/ / gal te ra ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ngo // gal ter ba'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod
27b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
27b2('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug
27b3('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa 'am// bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa'i 'am/
27b4('bum): sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par she
27b5('bum): pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
27b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par
27b7('bum): shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi sprod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug
28a1('bum): bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna'i rnam par shes pa med do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa la mi
28a2('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i
28a3('bum): rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngo do// gal te lnga'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces
28a4('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de
28a5('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur pa de lta bu'i lce'i rnam par
28a6('bum): shes pa med do/ / gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi
28a7('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
28b1('bum): te lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am
28b2('bum): mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam// bdag
28b3('bum): med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa med do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// /
28b4('bum): gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug
28b5('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
28b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod ra// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am
28b7('bum): mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa med do// gal te mig
29a1('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/
29a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi
29a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na
29a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug
29a5('bum): pabar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa med do/ / gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba
29a6('bum): 'bam/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
29a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sdug
29b1('bum): ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am
29b2('bum): bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
29b3('bum): pa la spyod do/ / gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba'am/
29b4('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
29b5('bum): pa la spyod do/ / gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/
29b6('bum): bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa med do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa la mi
29b7('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
30a1('bum): gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag
30a2('bum): ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ngo // gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
30a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi
30a4('bum): sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa med do/ / gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg
30a5('bum): pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
30a6('bum): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
30a7('bum): ro/ / gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag
30b1('bum): ba 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med do// gal
30b2('bum): te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyong na/ shes
30b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi
30b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug
30b5('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am// bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag
30b6('bum): med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med do// gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
30b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
31a1('bum): gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gas te
31a2('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung
31a3('bum): ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug
31a4('bum): bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
31a5('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
31a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
31a7('bum): gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las
31b1('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/
31b2('bum): sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med do// gal te sna'i 'dus te
31b3('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na//
31b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
31b5('bum): la spyod do/ / gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am// bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te spu'i
31b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/
31b7('bum): bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med do// gal te
