64a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/
64a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam
64a3('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mngon
64a4('bum): par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang
64a5('bum): yin pa de mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi
64a6('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi
64a7('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe
64b1('bum): nagazungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te de
64b2('bum): gnin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
64b3('bum): yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mi 'jigs pa
64b4('bum): bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mi 'jigs
64b5('bum): pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na
64b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no zhes
64b7('bum): bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te byams pa chen po yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
65a1('bum): spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa chen po yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de byams pa chen po ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
65a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying rje chen po yongs su
65a3('bum): ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngo // gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
65a4('bum): yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang
65a5('bum): yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod do/ / gal te thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab
65a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na
65a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na
65b1('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam
65b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rjes
65b3('bum): pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams drang mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
65b4('bum): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang /
65b5('bum): ma chags pa legs par bstan pa 'di ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
65b6('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang / ma chags pa legs par bstan
65b7('bum): to/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi

66a2('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'du shes chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/

66a6('bum): spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab
66a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sna chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

66b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te reg chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

71a2('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes
71a3('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma
71a4('bum): chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams chags pa 'am/
71a5('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams chags pa 'am/
71a6('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams chags pa'am/
71a7('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dbang po rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags
71b1('bum): pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te stobs rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa
71b2('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams chags pa 'am/
71b3('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
71b4('bum): pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i
71b5('bum): bden pa rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te
71b6('bum): bsam gtan rnams chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te
71b7('bum): tshad med pa rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gal
72a1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab
72a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes
72a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
72a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa chags pa 'am/
72a5('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa 'am/
72a6('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams chags pa'am/
72a7('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa 'am/
72b1('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
72b2('bum): chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mi 'jigs pa bzhi
72b3('bum): chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te so so yang dag par
72b4('bum): rig pa bzhi chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te byams
72b5('bum): bapa chen po chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te snying rje
72b6('bum): chen po chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sangs
72b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad chags pa'am/ mi chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong
73a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ gal te thams cad shes pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi
73a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
73a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinapa
73a4('bum): la spyod do/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ gzugs chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//
73a5('bum): tshor ba chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'du shes chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'du byed chags pa
73a6('bum): 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rnam par shes pa chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mig chags pa 'am/ ma chags
73a7('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / rna ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// snga chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//
73b1('bum): lce chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lus chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// yid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes//
73b2('bum): bya bar 'du shes pa med do// gzugs chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// sgra chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// dri
73b3('bum): chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// ro chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// reg chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya
73b4('bum): bar 'du shes pa med do/ / chos chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
73b5('bum): pa med do/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am// ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
73b6('bum): pab med do/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
73b7('bum): pa med do/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
74a1('bum): pa med do/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags
74a2('bum): ba zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa chags pa'am// ma chags
74a3('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
74a4('bum): chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// /
74a5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am// ma chags
74a6('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg
74a7('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// sa'i khams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//
74b1('bum): chu'i khams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// me'i khams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rlung gi khams
74b2('bum): chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// nam mkha'i khams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rnam par shes pa'i
74b3('bum): khams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// ma rig pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'du byed chags pa 'am//
74b4('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// ming dang gzugs chags pa'am// ma chags
74b5('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / skye mched drug chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// reg pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du
74b6('bum): shes pa med do/ / tshor ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// sred pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//
74b7('bum): len pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// srid pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// skye ba chags pa'am/
75a1('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rga shi chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags
75a2('bum): pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// bzod
75a3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du
75a4('bum): shes pa med do/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am/
75a5('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// phyi stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags
75a6('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am// ma chags
75a7('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / chen po stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// don dam pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma
75b1('bum): chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
75b2('bum): chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am// ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// thog ma dang tha
75b3('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//
75b4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//
75b5('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//
75b6('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am// ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//
75b7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams chags pa'am// ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du
76a1('bum): shes pa med do/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams chags pa 'am
76a2('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / dbang po rnams chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// stobs rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes
76a3('bum): bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa chags pa 'am/
76a4('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// bsam gtan rnams chags pa 'am/ ma
76a5('bum): chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / tshad med pa rnams chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
76a6('bum): chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rnam par thar pa brgyad chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i
76a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa chags
76b1('bum): pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams chags pa
76b2('bum): 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
76b3('bum): chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// so so yang dag par rig
76b4('bum): pa bzhi chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa mang do// byams pa chen po chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// snying rje chen po chags
76b5('bum): pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rgyun du
76b6('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa
76b7('bum): med do/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// dgra bcom pa nyid chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
77a1('bum): pa med do/ / rang byang chub chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa 'am
77a2('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su
77a3('bum): mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi 'phel/ ma bstan kyang mi 'phel ba ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhi ma
77a4('bum): chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi 'phe la/ ma bstan kyang mi 'phel lo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de
77a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing / nam mkha'i legs pa 'am ma legs pa brjod kyang / nam mkha' ni
77a6('bum): legs pa brjod pas yongs su 'phel ba med do/ / nyes pa brjod pas yongs su 'grib pa med do// nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod kyang chags pa med do// nyes pa brjod kyang
77a7('bum): khong khro ba med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do// nyes pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do// legs pa
77b1('bum): brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba med do/ / nyes pa brjod kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de bstan kyang de bzhin/
77b2('bum): ma bstan kyang de bzhin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
77b3('bum): bstan pa'i tshe/ zhum pa dang / g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson par bgyid cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar
77b4('bum): mi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni
77b5('bum): nam mkha' bsgom pa ste/ nam mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// 'du shes ma mchis so// 'du byed ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa ma mchis so//
77b6('bum): nam mkha' la ni mig ma mchis so// rna ba ma mchis so// sna ma mchis so// skye ma mchis so// lus ma mchis so// yid ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis
77b7('bum): so/ / sgra ma mchis so// dri ma mchis so// ro ma mchis so// reg ma mchis so// chos ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i rnam
78a1('bum): par shes pa ma mchis so/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// yid kyi rnam
78a2('bum): par shes pa ma mchis so/ / nam mkha' la ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg
78a3('bum): pa ma mchis so/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so//
78a4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// lus
78a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni sa'i khams ma mchis so// chu'i khams ma mchis
78a6('bum): so/ / me'i khams ma mchis so// rlung gi khams ma mchis so// nam mkha'i khams ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni ma rig pa ma mchis
78a7('bum): 'du byed ma mchis so/ / rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// ming dang gzugs ma mchis so// skye mched drug ma mchis so// reg pa ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// sred pa
78b1('bum): ma mchis so/ / len pa ma mchis so// srid pa ma mchis so// skye ba ma mchis so// rga shi ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha
78b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// shes
78b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ / nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so// phyi stong pa nyid ma mchis so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis
78b4('bum): so/ / chen po stong pa nyid ma mchis so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so// mtha' las 'das
78b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchis so// chos thams cad
78b6('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
78b7('bum): ma mchis so/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis so// yang dag par spong ba rnams ma mchis so//
79a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma mchis so// dbang po rnams ma mchis so// stobs rnams ma mchis so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma mchis so// 'phags
79a2('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so/ / nam mkha' la ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis so// bsam gtan rnams ma mchis so// tshad med pa rnams ma mchis so//
79a3('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa brgyad ma mchis so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma mchis so// rnam par thar
79a4('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma mchis so// mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ma mchis so// gzungs kyi sgo rnam
79a5('bum): ma mchis so/ / nam mkha' la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma mchis so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma mchis so// byams pa chen
79a6('bum): po ma mchis so/ / snying rje chen po ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// lan cig
79a7('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// dgra bcom pa nyid ma mchis so// rang byang chub ma mchis so// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
79b1('bum): pa'i byang chub ma mchis so/ / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya go gsum pa// / bcom ldan 'das byang chub
79b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'i don du brtson
79b3('bum): par mos/ 'bad par mos/ rtsol bar mos pa dag ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smin par 'tshal zhing
79b4('bum): yongs su grol bar 'tshal ba'o/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o//
79b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la gdeg par 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
79b6('bum): sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni brtson 'grus chen po thob pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
79b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi don du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
80a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
80a2('bum): rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni dpa' bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal ba'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
80a3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ 'di lta ste/ dper ma 'a ram bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til
80a4('bum): gyi zhing bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhim gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin
80a5('bum): gshegs pa re res sems canatshang ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am/ 'gang bar mi gda'
80a6('bum): 'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ de bzhin du gal te phyog bcu'i phyog re re'i zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
80a7('bum): snyeng dag 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du/
80b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res
80b2('bum): sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / / sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am// 'gang bar mi gda' 'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can
80b3('bum): ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ bdag 'di skad du sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
80b4('bum): mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ nam mkha' yongs su smin par bgyi bar 'tshal zhing / yongs su dgrol bar bgyi bar 'tshal ba lags zhes mchi'o// de nas
80b5('bum): dge slong gcig cig 'di snyam du gyur te/ gang la chos gang yang skye ba dang / 'gag pa yang med la/ tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yang yod/ shes rab
80b6('bum): kyi phung po yang yod/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po yang yod/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang yod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/ lan cig phyir
80b7('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bas ma yang yod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang yod/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang yod/ rang byang chub kyang yod/ bla na me sa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod/ rgyan du zhugs pa yang yod
81a1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang yod/ phyir mi 'ong ba yang yod/ dgra bcom pa yang yod/ rang sangs rgyas kyang yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
81a2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos dkon mchog kyang yod/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang
81a3('bum): yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
81a4('bum): smras so/ / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yod na/ de gang la brtson
81a5('bum): par byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par sems pa de ni/ nam mkha' stong pa la brtson pa'o// de nas lha'i
81a6('bum): dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa
81a7('bum): dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab pa ji lta bu zhig dgyi/
81b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka khyod kyis gang la bsrung
81b2('bum): ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor pa dag gis gang la bsrung ba dang // bskyang ba dang / bskyab
81b3('bum): par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
81b4('bum): tu phyin pa la gnas na/ de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par 'gyur ro// gal te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na
81b5('bum): de la mi 'am mi ma yin pa glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / gang ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
81b6('bum): kyi bu mo de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o/ / ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung
81b7('bum): ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni/ nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par sems pa ste/ de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i
82a1('bum): skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ / ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / sprul pa la bsrung
82a2('bum): ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par nus sam// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
82a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni/ bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur
82a4('bum): ro/ / ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par nus sam/ brgya
82a5('bum): byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams
82a6('bum): bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni/ bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis chos
82a7('bum): kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/
82b1('bum): btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang
82b2('bum): bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni/ bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
82b3('bum): rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rmi lam lta bu'i
82b4('bum): chos dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams yongs su shes pa dang / de ltar yongs su shes pas
82b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed
82b6('bum): sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan
82b7('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/
83a1('bum): mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa yin no// rab
83a2('bum): 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyis
83a3('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//

83a6('bum): mig yor gyi rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su
83a7('bum): mi byed do/ / ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba rlom sems su mi byed/ tshor bas rlom sems su
83b1('bum): s nrums rlom sems su mi byed

107a1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sem
107a2('bum): su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/
107a3('bum): smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brlan la rlom sems su mi byed do// /
107a4('bum): de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi
107a5('bum): byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
107a6('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam
107a7('bum): gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do// de smig
107b1('bum): rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do// de smra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed
107b2('bum): sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ / de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems
107b3('bum): su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
107b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rlom sems su mi byed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems
107b5('bum): su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems

108a1('bum): yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ / de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// ko'u shi ka
108a2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rlom sems su mi byed/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
108a3('bum): pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed//

113b7('bum): sems su mi byed do/ / de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/
114a1('bum): sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
114a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis rlom semasu mi byed/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rlom

120b3('bum): mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa'
120b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed
120b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//
120b6('bum): sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la
120b7('bum): rlom sems su mi byed do/ / de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ zla brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brlan la rlom sems su mi byed do// de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed
121a1('bum): mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa
121a2('bum): rlom sems su mi byed do/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya go lnga pa// // de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum
121a3('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang /
121a4('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha
121a5('bum): dang tshad med snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad med dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang
121a6('bum): tshad med che ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / mi che ba'i lha dang / mi gdung ba'i lha dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og min gyi lha dang lha gang ji
121a7('bum): sbed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan
121b1('bum): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
121b2('bum): pa dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs
121b3('bum): kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
121b4('bum): nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su rdib sems la sna
121b5('bum): bar gyur to/ / lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
121b6('bum): pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba
121b7('bum): sems la snang bar 'gyur to/ / nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes
122a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po bcu byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
122a2('bum): pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ / byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor
122a3('bum): ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha
122a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba//
122a5('bum): dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
122a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag
122a7('bum): nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya
122b1('bum): byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su rdib sems la snang bar 'gyur to// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa
122b2('bum): mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i
122b3('bum): dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis
122b4('bum): chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di
122b5('bum): nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
122b6('bum): stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba bstag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab
122b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to// steng gi
122'a1('bum): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid sa/
122'a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to// de nas
122'a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang / sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par
122'a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro// gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
122'a5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag kyang / sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
122'a6('bum): nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro/ / gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dang / rtags gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa
122'a7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
122'b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / 'di la rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs
122'b2('bum): rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
122'b3('bum): gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs zhi zhes bya ba
122'b4('bum): 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs bcings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// /
122'b5('bum): gzugs ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi
122'b6('bum): 'gyur ro/ / tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// tshor ba sdug
122'b7('bum): ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba 'am// ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// tshor ba bcings zhes bya ba'am/ grol zhes
123a1('bum): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / tshor ba 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// tshor ba ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// tshor ba da ltar byung zhes bya
123a2('bum): bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'du shes rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'du shes bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
123a3('bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'du shes bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'du shes sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'du shes zhi zhes
123a4('bum): bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'du shes bcings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'du shes 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
123a5('bum): 'du shes ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'du shes da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// /
123a6('bum): 'du byed bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'du byed bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'du byed sdug ces
123a7('bum): bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'du byed zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'du byed bcings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos
123b1('bum): / ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'du byed 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'du byed ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'du byed da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur//
123b2('bum): ro// rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
123b3('bum): rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam
123b4('bum): par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bcings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa
123b5('bum): 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mig
123b6('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mig bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mig bdag ces bya ba 'am/
123b7('bum): bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mig sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mig zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos
124a1('bum): ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / mig bcings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mig 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mig ma
124a2('bum): 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / mig da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rna ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rna ba
124a3('bum): bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rna ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rna ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug
124a4('bum): ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / rna ba zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rna ba bcings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
124a5('bum): ro/ / rna ba 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rna ba ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rna ba da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sna rtag ces
124a6('bum): bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sna bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sna bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar
124a7('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / sna sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sna zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ pa zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sna bcings
124b1('bum): zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sgra 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// snam 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sna da ltar byung
124b2('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / lce rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// lce bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// /
124b3('bum): skye bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// lce sdug ces bya ba 'am// mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// lce zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes
124b4('bum): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / lce bcings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// lce 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// lde ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston
124b5('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ / lce da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// lus rtag ces bya ba// mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// lus bde zhes bya ba 'am/
124b6('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// lus bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// lus sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos
124b7('bum): ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / lus zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// lus bcings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// lus
125a1('bum): 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / lus ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// lus da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
125a2('bum): yid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// yid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// yid bdag ces bya ba 'am
125a3('bum): bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / yid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// yid zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi/
125a4('bum): 'gyur ro// yid bcings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// yid 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// yid ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston
125a5('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ / yid da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/
125a6('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar
125a7('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs bcings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
125b1('bum): ro/ / gzugs 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
125b2('bum): sgra rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// smra bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sgra bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med
125b3('bum): ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / sgra sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sgra zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
125b4('bum): sgrabacings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sgra 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sgra ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
125b5('bum): da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// dri rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// zi bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston
125b6('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ / dri bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// ji sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// dri zhon
125b7('bum): bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rmi bcings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// dri 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
126a1('bum): 'gyur ro/ / ji ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// dri da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// ro rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya
126a2('bum): bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / ro bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// ro bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par
126a3('bum): mi 'gyur ro/ / ro sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// ro zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// ro bcings zhes bya ba
126a4('bum): 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// ro 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// ro ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// ro da ltar byung zhes bya
126a5('bum): bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / reg rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// reg bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
126a6('bum): ro/ / reg bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// reg sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// reg zhi zhes bya ba 'am/

126b1('bum): 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / reg da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// chos rtag ces bya ba'am// mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// chos ba/

133a3('bum): chu'i khams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// me'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// me'i khams bde zhes bya ba 'am/

133a5('bum): sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / me'i khams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// me'i khams bcings zhes bya ba'am// grol zhes bya bar
133a6('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / me'i khams 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// me'i khams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// me'i khams da ltar byung zhes bya bar
133a7('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / rlung gi khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rlung gi khams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi

146b2('bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bcings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
146b3('bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'phags/
146b4('bum): ba'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
146b5('bum): ro/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos
146b6('bum): ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar
146b7('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
147a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am// mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur/

147a7('bum): 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// tsha'i med pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// tshad med pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba 'am/

153b1('bum): ston par 'gyur ro/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag go/

153b3('bum): tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//

172b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang
172b5('bum): lce'i nad dang / yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro// lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro// rga bas 'khogs pa'i lus su mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni mi bde ba mi spong bas dus
172b6('bum): byed par mi 'gyur ro/ / de'i slad bzhin lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang // gzhan
172b7('bum): 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye ngan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge
173a1('bum): ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin
173a2('bum): tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro// gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa de
173a3('bum): yang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe/ bsod nams mang du/
173a4('bum): 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba/ tshad ma mchis pa/ grangs ma mchis pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa/
173a5('bum): gzhal du ma mchis pa/ dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
173a6('bum): gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams mang du 'phel te// bsod
173a7('bum): nams kyi phung po mang ba/ tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ dpag tu med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir
173b1('bum): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che chen po'o// rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o// byol
173b2('bum): song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi dang lha dbul po las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o// rgyal rig che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin
173b3('bum): pa'o/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// mtshe ma'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// dga' ldan gyi lha'i skye ba'i
173b4('bum): skye mched 'byin pa'o/ / 'phrul dga'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// tshangs ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// tshangs
173b5('bum): lha nye phan gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// tshangs chen gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//
173b6('bum): chung snang gi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// tshad med snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// kun snang dang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// dge ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye marnyed 'byin pa'o// rlung
173b7('bum): dge'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ / tshad med dge ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// dge rgyas kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// chung che'i
174a1('bum): lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ / tshad med che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// 'bras bu che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// mi che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/
174a2('bum): mi gdung ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// gya nom snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// 'og min gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched
174a3('bum): 'byin pa'o/ / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha'i
174a4('bum): skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ / 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// lan cig phyin 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/
174a5('bum): 'byin pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid 'byin pa'o// rang byang chub 'byin pa'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
174a6('bum): de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan te/ de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
174a7('bum): yod do/ / khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mche ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi
174b1('bum): mas yod do/ / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod // tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nyelar gyi lha rnams yod// tshangs pa kun 'khor chen
174b2('bum): rnams yod do/ / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshang med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang da ba'i lha rnams yod do//
174b3('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do//
174b4('bum): med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams
174b5('bum): yod do/ / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod
174b6('bum): dodo/ / 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//
174b7('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yod na/ bsam gtan bzhi yod do// gzugs med
175a1('bum): / pa'i snyoms par 'grug pa na ni yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yod do// yang dag par spo ba bzhi yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi dang pa bcu yod do// dbang po sna yod do//
175a2('bum): stobs lnga yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod
175a3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa
175a4('bum): nyid yod do/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas
175a5('bum): stong pa nyid yod do/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams
175a6('bum): cad stong pa nyid yod do/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i
175a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yod do// bsam gtan bzhi yod do// tshad med pa bzhi yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do// rnam
175b1('bum): par thar pa brgyad yod do/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yod do// mngon pa shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin thams cad yod
175b2('bum): do/ / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yod do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yod do// byams pa chen po yod do//
175b3('bum): snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// thams cad shes pa nyid yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//
175b4('bum): de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de la bslabs na/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
175b5('bum): yod do/ / khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga'
175b6('bum): ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//
175b7('bum): tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang
176a1('bum): dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// rlung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi sgra rnams yod do// che ba'i
176a2('bum): lha rnams yod do/ / chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin
176a3('bum): tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi
176a4('bum): lha rnams yod do/ / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba
176a5('bum): rnams yod do/ / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
176a6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ / de bas na de la pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o// pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de la ni/ chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am// kun
176a7('bum): nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ dor ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam pa
176b1('bum): byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ dor bar bya ba de lta bu'i chos med do// rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni/ dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las
176b2('bum): 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni
176b3('bum): dmigs su med do/ / rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni/ chos gang gis kyang 'go ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'go bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su med de/
176b4('bum): rab 'byor de'i phyir na/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
176b5('bum): de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed la/ de ltar mi rtog cing de ltar mi dmigs te/ de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom
176b6('bum): pa'o/ / de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang
176b7('bum): bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyod
177a1('bum): par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang yang ston pa 'am/ rnam par ston pa
177a2('bum): 'am/ yongs su ston pa 'am/ 'dzin par byed pa 'am/ 'byin par byed pa 'am/ skye bar byed pa'am/ 'gag par byed pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa 'am/ rnam
177a3('bum): par byang bar byed pa 'am/ 'grib par byed pa 'am/ 'phel bar byed pa 'am/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung bar byed pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
177a4('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin// gzugs
177a5('bum): med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya go brgyad pa// /
177a6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin la sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin// 'dor
177a7('bum): ba ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma
177b1('bum): yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/
177b2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus
177b3('bum): byas stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/
177b4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma
177b5('bum): yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin//
177b6('bum): 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgrub
177b7('bum): pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
178a1('bum): pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dbang po rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ stobs rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub kyi
178a2('bum): yan lag rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/
178a3('bum): bsam gtan rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin// 'dor ba ma yin
178a4('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
178a5('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgrub pa ma yin// 'dor ba ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin// 'dor ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba
178a6('bum): ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin// 'dor
178a7('bum): ba ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ byams pa chen po sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ snying rje chen po sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/
