313a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ / rab 'byor tshad med pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
313a7('bum): byiphyin pa zab bo/ / rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zab pa'i phyir/ shes
313b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ / rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor mngon
313b2('bum): parang shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo zab pa'i phyir
313b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ / rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
313b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ / rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor snying rje chen po zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
313b5('bum): zab bo/ / rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'a dres pa bco brgyad zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor thams cad shes pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
313b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ / rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab
313b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'i phung po ste/ chos rin po che'i phung po rnams sgrub pa'o// 'di lta ste/
314a1('bum): dge ba bcu'i las kyi kham sgrub pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi sgrub pa'o// tshad med pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// mngon par shes pa
314a2('bum): lnga sgrub pa'o/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgrub pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// dbang po lnga sgrub pa'o// stobs lnga sgrub pa'o// byang chub
314a3('bum): kyi yan lag bdun sgrub pa'o/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgrub pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad sgrub pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
314a4('bum): par 'jug pa dgu sgrub pa'o/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgrub pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams sgrub pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa'o//
314a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu slab pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// snying rje chen po sgrub pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
314a6('bum): brgyad sgrub pa'o/ / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa'o// rang byang chub
314a7('bum): sgrub pa'o/ / thams cad shes pa nyid sgrub pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
314b1('bum): tu phyin pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gzugs dag pa dang / tshor ba dag pa dang / 'du shes dag pa dang 'du byed dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / mig dag
314b2('bum): pa dang / rna ba dag pa dang / sna dag pa dang / lce dag pa dang / lus dag pa dang / yid dag pa dang / gzugs dag pa dang / sgra dag pa dang / dri dag pa dang / ro dag pa dang / reg dag pa dang /
314b3('bum): chos dag pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa
314b4('bum): dag pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dag
314b5('bum): pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa
314b6('bum): dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg
314b7('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang / sa'i khams dag pa dang / chu'i khams dag pa dang / me'i khams dag pa dang / rlung gi khams dag pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i
315a1('bum): khams dag pa dang / ma rig pa dag pa dang / 'du byed dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / ming dang gzugs dag pa dang / skye mched drug dag pa dang / reg pa dag/
315a2('bum): pa dang / tshor ba dag pa dang / sred pa dag pa dang / len pa dag pa dang / srid pa dag pa dang / skye ba dag pa dang / rga shi dag pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
315a3('bum): phyin pa dag pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang /
315a4('bum): nang stong pa nyid dag pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dag pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dag pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid dag pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dag pa
315a5('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dag pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dag pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dor ba
315a6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dag pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dag pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang //
315a7('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dag pa
315b1('bum): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dag pa dang / dbang po dag pa dang / stobs dag pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i
315b2('bum): bden pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan dag pa dang / tshad med pa dag pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa dag pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
315b3('bum): par 'jug pa dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dag pa dang / gzungs
315b4('bum): kyi sgo dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dag pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dag pa dang / snying rje chen po dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
315b5('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dag pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha
315b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni dag pa'i phung po'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta bu bstan pa'i tshe/ bar chad mang du mi 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar che'o//
315b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bar chad mang po 'byung ste/ de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am
316a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / bsgom par bya la bar chad du mi
316a2('bum): 'gyur bar bri na yang myur du bri bar bya'o/ / bklag na yang myur du bklag go/ bstan na yang myur du bstan to// tshul bzhin du yid la bya na yang myur du tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/ kha sgom na
316a3('bum): yang myur du bsgom mo/ / rab 'byor de bas na gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di zla ba gcig gis bri bar bya na yang des de bzhin du bri bar bya'o//
316a4('bum): gal te zla ba gnyis sam/ gal te zla ba gsum mam/ gal te zla ba bzhi 'am/ gal te zla ba lnga 'am/ gal te zla ba drug gam/ gal te lo'i bar gyis bri bar bya na yang de bzhin du bri bar bya'o//
316a5('bum): bal te zla ba gcig gis bstan pa dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / bsgom par bya na yang de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o// gal te lo'i bar gyis
316a6('bum): bsgom par bya na yang de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni nor bu rin po che chen po la bar chad mang du 'byung ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
316a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ci nas kyang mi bri ba dang / mi bklag pa dang / mi bstan pa dang / kha ton mi bgyi ba dang / yid la mi bgyid pa dang / mi sgom pa'i slad du bdud sdig to can dag bar chad mi
316b1('bum): / bgyid pa ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ci nas kyang mi bri ba dang / mi bklag pa dang / mi bstan pa dang / batshan ma
316b2('bum): bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya ba dang / mi sgom pa'i phyir bdud sdig to can bar chad mi byed pa yang ma yin mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
316b3('bum): pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / sgom pa rnams la bar chad bya bar mi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la
316b4('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ci'i mthus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / kha ton du bgyi ba dang /
316b5('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / bsgom pa la bdud sdig to can bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ byang chub
316b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa dag la bdud
316b7('bum): sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar mi nus so/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /
317a1('bum): chos ston pa de dag gi mthus kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton
317a2('bum): du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa de dag la bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar mi nus so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
317a3('bum): dpa' chen po de dag la dgongs shing yongs su 'dzin pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag shes rab kyi pha
317a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa de dag la bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar mi nus so//
317a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya/
317a6('bum): bar mi nus so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni gang de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
317a7('bum): tshad med grangs med pa bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba la dgongs pa mdzad pa dang /
317b1('bum): klog cing ston pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa la dgongs pa mdzad pa ni chos nyid kyi de bzhin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes
317b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa des kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
317b3('bum): 'dri'o/ / klog go// ston to// kha ton du byed do// tshul bzhin du yid la byed do// bsgom mo zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'aras rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
317b4('bum): mo gang su yang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / bsgom mo 'tshal
317b5('bum): kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/ kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi gzungs lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad
317b6('bum): du smras pa bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid
317b7('bum): kha byed cing bsgom pa de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin par rig par bya'o/ / de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi gzungs yin par rig par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi
318a1('bum): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing ba ton du bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing bsgom pa de dag ni/
318a2('bum): shar phyogs nas phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag
318a3('bum): gis mkhyen te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing kha ton du bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing bsgom pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom
318a4('bum): ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ / thugs su chud do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am
318a5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing bsgom pa de dag ni/ shar phyogs dang / lho
318a6('bum): phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /
318a7('bum): 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa de dag gis mkhyen to// sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs shing thugs su chud do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub
318b1('bum): / sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul
318b2('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa de dag gis kyang 'di ltar bdag cag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur to zhes bya
318b3('bum): bar rig par bya'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas
318b4('bum): te/ 'chang ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa mang bar 'gyur te/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang
318b5('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed do// de ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
318b6('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di bris shing 'chang ba de dag kyang don che ba dang / legs pa che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / rnam par smin pa che bar 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu
318b7('bum): mo de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su non gyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ / nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi
319a1('bum): 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du dge ba'i
319a2('bum): rtsa ba de nyid kyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
319a3('bum): nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi
319a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / nang stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid dang nam yang
319a5('bum): bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar
319a6('bum): mi 'gyur ro/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang
319a7('bum): bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / thob ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang
319b1('bum): nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
319b2('bum): nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
319b3('bum): nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi
319b4('bum): rkang pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / dbang po rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// stobs rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
319b5('bum): dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// bsam
319b6('bum): gtan rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / tshad med pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//
319b7('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
320a1('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam
320a2('bum): yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang nam yang
320a3('bum): bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po dang rnam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang
320a4('bum): nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa 'das nas/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/ de na byang
320a5('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag mos pa dam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/
320a6('bum): 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang
320a7('bum): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed par 'gyur ro// de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des
320b1('bum): nam yang ngan song du khog par lhung bar mi 'dong ste/ de dag gis lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro// de dag pha rol tu phyin pa
320b2('bum): drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am
320b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar shes rab
320b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rgyud nas/ yul bar ha ni na spyod par 'gyur te/ de na yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang
320b5('bum): dge ba snyen ma dag mos pa dam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur
320b6('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim
320b7('bum): gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed par 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par lhung bar mi 'dong ste/ de dag gis lha dang mi'i phun sum
321a1('bum): tshogs pa myong zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/ / de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs
321a2('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
321a3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yul bar ta ni nas/ byang
321a4('bum): phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/ de na yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag mos pa dam pas/ shes rab kyi
321a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ me tog
321a6('bum): dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bzab dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed
321a7('bum): mchod par byed par 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar mi 'dong ste/ de dag gis lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis
321b1('bum): mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/ / de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang /
321b2('bum): mchod pa byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las
321b3('bum): 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rgyud dang / byang phyogs kyi rgyud na phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya tha ma la sangs rgyas kyi
321b4('bum): bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
321b5('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos dang 'dul ba dar la bab pa'i tshe/ dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur te/ chos de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
321b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun
321b7('bum): chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa de dag la ni ngas dgongs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi
322a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa rab mo 'di 'dri zhing / bris nas kyang me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal ma/
322a2('bum): dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed pa de dag kyang ngas dgongs te/ shA ra dwa ta'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des
322a3('bum): nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar mi 'dong ste/ de dag lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro// de dag pha rol tu phyin
322a4('bum): pha drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed cing nyan thos kyi theg pa
322a5('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i
322a6('bum): phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo
322a7('bum): de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas brjed do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / ribs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstod do// bsngags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang
322b1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
322b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
322b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ / bstod do// bsngags so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
322b4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs
322b5('bum): so/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do// bstod do// bsngags so// rigs kyi
322b6('bum): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
322b7('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
323a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ / kha stod do// bsngags so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa//
323a2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
323a3('bum): gzigs so/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do// bstod do// bsngags so// rigs kyi bu
323a4('bum): dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin
323a5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
323a6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ / bstod do// bsngags so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
323a7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigaso//
323b1('bum): rigs kyi bu dang ga rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do// bstod do// bsngags so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
323b2('bum): bu mo de dag ni lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
323b3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
323b4('bum): rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ / bstod do// bsngags so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
323b5('bum): rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu
323b6('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ / bstod do// bsngags so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag
323b7('bum): ni 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
324a1('bum): sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
324a2('bum): sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ / bstod do// bsngags so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
324a3('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho sbyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang /
324a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do// bstod do// bsngags so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
324a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na byang phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te
324a6('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na byang phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur te/ de la shA ra dwa ti'i bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo
324a7('bum): de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ro// mos par byas nas kyang 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa
324b1('bum): dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
324b2('bum): 'di nyan cing bos nas mos par byed pa dang / mos par byas nas 'dri zhing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan
324b3('bum): tan du byed pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa
324b4('bum): bab bskyed par rig par bya'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus smad ma'i tshe na byang gi phyogs cha der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi
324b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing thos nas mos par bgyid pa dang / mos par bgyis nas 'dri zhing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid
324b6('bum): pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du bgyid pa de lta bu ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na byang gi phyogs cha der
324b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theb pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo ni mang du 'byung ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha
325a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ mi 'dzum/ yongs su mi 'dzum/ mi 'jigs/ mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni mang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
325a2('bum): dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs
325a3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po la yongs su zhus/ yongs su dris pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
325a4('bum): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
325a5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi
325a6('bum): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
325a7('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang /
325b1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
325b2('bum): bu mo de dag ni chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo
325b3('bum): de dag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
325b4('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
325b5('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
325b6('bum): ro/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
325b7('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dngos po med pa
326a1('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
326a2('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang / ribs kyi bu mo de dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs
326a3('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni yang dag par spong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang
326a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni stobs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub kyi
326a5('bum): ya.an khag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
326a6('bum): bu mo de dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam gtan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu
326a7('bum): mo de dag ni tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
326b1('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
326b2('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag
326b3('bum): ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzungs
326b4('bum): kyi sgo yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
326b5('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
326b6('bum): ting rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang /
326b7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shA
327a1('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni ngas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod do// 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
327a2('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
327a3('bum): pa'i gtam brjod do/ / de dag tshe 'das nas kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de dag gzhan la yang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag
327a4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du rnam pa de lta bu nyid brjod par 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur te/ de dag ni bdud dam/ bdud
327a5('bum): kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bzlog par mi nus na/ sdig to la mos pa dang / sdig to'i spyod pa can/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
327a6('bum): spong ba gzhan gyis lta ci smos/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ dga' zhing nyams
327a7('bum): bde ba rgya chen po skye bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po yang dge ba'i chos la 'god par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu
327b1('bum): mo de dag gis ni nga'i mdun du 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags
327b2('bum): brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu rab tu dgod par bgyi'o/ / yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o// yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o// yang dag par gzengs bstod par bgyi'o// yang dag par dga'
327b3('bum): bar bgyi'o/ / phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig ni sems la sems kyis
327b4('bum): rnam par lta ste/ ngas rjes su dgyes pa mdzad do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar yang rigs kyi bu dang
327b5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'di skad du/ bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srob chags brgya stong
327b6('bum): phrag mang po byang chub tu dgod par bgyi'o/ / yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o// yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o// yang dag par gzengs bstod par bgyi'o// yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o//
327b7('bum): phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang rigs
328a1('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig ni sems la thugs kyi rnam par gzigs te rjes su dgyes pa mdzad do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i
328a2('bum): spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'god par 'gyur/ yang dag
328a3('bum): par ston par 'gyur/ yang dag par bskul bar 'gyur/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par 'gyur/ yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog par lung ston par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu
328a4('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg la mos pa rlabs po cher 'gyur te/ de dag sbyin pa rlabs po che gtong bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa rlabs po che btang zhing
328a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro/ / de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs chen po mngon par 'dus byas nas/ rnam par smin pa rlabs po che yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ de dag rnam
328a6('bum): par smin pa rlabs chen po yongs su gzung nas/ sems can de dag nyid kyi don du rnam par smin pa rlabs chen po las/ de bas kyang ches rlabs che ba'i rnam par smin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//
328a7('bum): 'di ltar phyi 'am nang gi dngos po de dag kyang sems can de dag nyid la yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
328b1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid kyi chos ston pa mngon du gyur pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
328b2('bum): dag la rten par 'gyur ro/ / de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mngon sum du thos nas/
328b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu yang srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag
328b4('bum): par ston par 'gyur ro/ / yang dag par skul bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par gzengs bstod par 'gyur ro// yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
328b5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams las chos gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis
328b6('bum): so/ / de bzhin cid dang chos nyid gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// sems can rnams kyi sems gang yang thugs sum chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis pa ni ngo mtshar che
328b7('bum): 'di ltar 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ / 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
329a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to// ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to// ma
329a2('bum): byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to// da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams
329a3('bum): kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston
329a4('bum): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang
329a5('bum): yongs su mkhyen to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi slad du brtson par bgyid cing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag tshol
329a6('bum): pa dang / yongs su tshol ba'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag tshol ba dang / yongs su tshol ba las/ la las ni btsal ba las pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di
329a7('bum): ngag thob par 'gyur/ la las ni thob par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo brtson 'grus mi
329b1('bum): gtong ba de dag kun gyis kyang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag pha rol tu
329b2('bum): phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi don du brtson par byed pa'i phyir ro/ / gsol pa/ ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug
329b3('bum): dang ldan pa 'di dag kun kyang 'grub par 'gyur ramabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug
329b4('bum): dang ldan pa 'di dag mi 'grub par 'gyur pa de lta bu'i gnas med skabs med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can rnams yang
329b5('bum): dag par ston cing / yang dag par skul ba dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dang / 'god cing rab tu gzhog pa las kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa
329b6('bum): ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'das nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'grub par 'gyur ro// de dag ni nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas/ sems can
329b7('bum): yongs su smin par ma byas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur kyi bar du/ ji skad du bstan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag las
330a1('bum): brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum cu gcig go// / shes rab kyi pha rol
330a2('bum): phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyis brgya drug pa/ / // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu
330a3('bum): dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
330a4('bum): yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gi yon tan yongs su brjod pa ni 'di dag lags na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa de dag
330a5('bum): la bar chad du 'gyur ba ji lta bu dag mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor spobs pa ha cang 'phyi ste skye na/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
330a6('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du spobs pa ha cang 'a phyi ste skye bar 'gyur/ de ni ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi
330a7('bum): las su rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol
330b1('bum): tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/
330b2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par
330b3('bum): byed na/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des shin tu 'phyi ste spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro// de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shin tu
330b4('bum): myur bar spobs pa skye ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye bar 'gyur
330b5('bum): de ni ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
330b6('bum): chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor pa
330b7('bum): dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ha cang myur bar spobs pa skye la/ des rlom sems su byed na/
331a1('bum): rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ spobs pa ha cang myur bar skye ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang glal
331a2('bum): cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang dgod cing 'dri na/ rab 'byor
331a3('bum): de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor phan tshun steg cing 'dri na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud
331a4('bum): kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / sems g.yeng zhing 'dri na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// yi ge gzhan la chags shing tshig gi don mi
331a5('bum): shes par 'dri na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// 'di'i ro ma myong nas stan las langs te 'gro na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub
331a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang glal cing lung 'bog na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las
331a7('bum): su rig par bya'o/ / glal cing kha ton byed dam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ sngon tam/ glal cing tshul bzhin du ying la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
331b1('bum): pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang phan tshun dgod cing 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub
331b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang phan tshun steg cing 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ glo ba gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la
331b3('bum): byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang sems g.yeng bas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub
331b4('bum): par byed dmatshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang yi ge gzhan dang gzhan la
331b5('bum): chags shing 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par
331b6('bum): bya'o/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du/ 'di'i ro ma myong nas stan las
331b7('bum): langs te 'gro na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slang du 'di'i ro mo myong bar 'gyur/
332a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
332a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pa de dag/
332a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las bdag cag lung ma bstan to zhes ma dad pa'i yid kyis stan las langs shing 'dong ste/ rab 'byor de yang
332a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las lung ma bstan par de dag stan las
332a5('bum): langs shing mchi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med par ma chud pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
332a6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan te/ de la bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las mi 'byung ngo // bdag gi ming yang yongs su ma brjod do zhes dad par ma gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub
332a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las byang chub sems dpa' sems
332b1('bum): dpa' chen po de dag gi ming yongs su ma brjod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa rnams kyi ming ni yongs su mi brjod de/
332b2('bum): de la bdag gi ming yang 'di las mi 'byung / bdag gang du skyes pa'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal gyi ming yang mi 'byang ngo zhes de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi nyan to snyam byed cing 'khor de nas
332b3('bum): 'gro bar sems na/ sems bskyed pa des ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar sems shing gom pa ji snyed cig bor pa de snyed kyi bskal pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ de dag la gzod brtson par bya dgos
332b4('bum): so/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing mdo sde gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa de dag kun chub par bya bar sems te/ des na byang chub sems dpa'i
332b5('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing gi rtsa ba spangs te/ de nyid kyi yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma la 'ju bar sems par gyur pa dag
332b6('bum): ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi
332b7('bum): sgrub pa'i mdo sde kun chub par bgyi bar sems par 'gyur pa de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan pa das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde gang nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
333a1('bum): pa de dag ste/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub
333a2('bum): kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing rigs
333a3('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa dang / rang
333a4('bum): byang chub 'thob par 'gyur gyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par mi 'gyur ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde gang la shes
333a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing kun chub par bya bar snyems pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
333a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
333a7('bum): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la slob pa yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na khyi la la zhig jo
333b1('bum): bo'i zan nar ma bor te/ las mi las zan btsal bar sems pa dang 'dra bar de bzhin du/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes
333b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa 'di bor te/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma lta bu'i mdo sde nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dag la
333b3('bum): brten par sems pa 'byung ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub
333b4('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor nas/ khe dang bkur sti'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
333b5('bum): mdo sde rnams kun chub par bya bar sems pa 'byung ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na
333b6('bum): mi la la zhig glang po 'dod la/ des glang po rnyed nas glang po'i rjes btsal bar sems pa yod na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/
333b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang za/ bshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhi//
334a1('bum): mdo sde gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag btsal bar sems pa dag kyang dpe de dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa'
334a2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po blta bar 'dod la/ ba glang gi rjes btsal bar sems shing nges pa glang gi rjes
334a3('bum): mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du/ rgya mtsho chen po'i tshad 'di dang mnyam mam mi mnyam snyam na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom
334a4('bum): ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu
334a5('bum): dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
334a6('bum): ldan pa'i mdo sde dag gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang rnam pa de ltar rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las
334a7('bum): su rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na phya mkhan nam/ phya mkhan gyi slob ma rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad du khang pa zhig dbub cing / bslang bar 'dod de nyi ma dang zla ba'i
334b1('bum): gzhal med khang yongs su btsal bar sems shing / nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang las chang blang bar sems na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu des nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi
334b2('bum): tshad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad dang / dpe tshul bzung ste de dang 'dra ba'i khang pa dbub par nus sam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
334b3('bum): stsal pa rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ phya mkhan nam/ phya mkhan gyi slob ma de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu de ni byis pa'i ngang tshul can du
334b4('bum): rig par bgyi ste/ mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
334b5('bum): kyekyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
334b6('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
334b7('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
335a1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig
335a2('bum): 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod la/ des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong nas/ 'di snyam du 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po de kha dog dang dbyibs ci 'dra ba zhig yod ces/ des khams kyi rgyal
335a3('bum): phran mthong ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs kyi mtshan ma bzung bar bsams te/ 'di skad du 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po ro'i kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma yang sa'i bdag po 'di 'dra ba zhig
335a4('bum): yod grang zhes zer na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so//
335a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu lam/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
335a6('bum): zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal
335a7('bum): bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
335b1('bum): de ni ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes
335b2('bum): bu shin tu bkres pa la la zhig gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas rnyed kyang / drug cu pa'i kha zas btsal bar sems shing des kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa de bor nas/ drug cu pa'i kha zas la bza' bar
335b3('bum): bsams na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
335b4('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang
335b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa
335b6('bum): 'byung na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
335b7('bum): ni ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper
336a1('bum): na skyes bu la la zhig gis nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa rnyed nas/ nor bu mching bu dang bskrun par bsams na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas
336a2('bum): pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i
336a3('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos
336a4('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
336a5('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
336a6('bum): de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha
336a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ spobs pa mang po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i dbugs mar 'gyur ba de lta bu skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ltar gzug
336b1('bum): kyi spobs pa dang / sgra'i spobs pa dang / dri'i spobs pa dang / ro'i spobs pa dang / reg gi spobs pa dang / chos kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi spobs pa dang
336b2('bum): bzod pa'i spobs pa dang brtson 'grus kyi spobs pa dang bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang / shes rab kyi spobs pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / gzugs kyi khams
336b3('bum): kyi spobs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba'i spobs pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i spobs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spobs pa
336b4('bum): dang / yang dag par spong ba'i spobs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i spobs pa dang / dbang po'i spobs pa dang / stobs kyi spobs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi spobs pa dang
336b5('bum): lam gyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i spobs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spobs pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i spobs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi
336b6('bum): spobs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / don dam pa
336b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma
337a1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang /
337a2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po med
337a3('bum): paba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang
337a4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / stobs bcu'i spobs pa dang / mi
337a5('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi'i spobs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi spobs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa
337a6('bum): dang / lan cig phyir 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rang byang chub kyi spobs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par
337a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spobs pa med pas rnam par byang ba'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam
337b1('bum): gyis mi khyab pa'o/ / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems med pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
337b2('bum): ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa'o/ / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brjod du med pa'o// rab
337b3('bum): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par byang ba med pa'o/ / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs su med pa'o// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag ni shes rab kyi pha
337b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la med cing mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/
337b5('bum): chos de dag gis 'khrug par gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//
337b6('bum): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar nus lags sam
337b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta ma yin no// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// bsam gtan rgya
338a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa drA sa~Mn d+he mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/
338a2('bum): ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//
338a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// stong
338a4('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ / chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//
338a5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
338a6('bum): yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// rang bzhin
338a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs
338b1('bum): so/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te

338b6('bum): nyid mod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs

339a1('bum): ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so//
339a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi

339a5('bum): nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ / ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ dngos po med pas dngos po med pa bri/

339a7('bum): rig par bya'o/ / gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bris nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
339b1('bum): ba zab mo 'di bdag gis bris so zhes mchi na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la yi ger mngon par chags pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o//

343a1('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klob pa

343a3('bum): par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang /

343a5('bum): 'khor gyi yid la bya ba dang / khyim gyi yid la bya ba dang / bla ma dang mkhan po'i yid la bya ba dang / ma dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / pha dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / phu nu dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
343a6('bum): dang / sring mo dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / gnyen bshes dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / rkun po dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / phyag dar ba dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang
343a7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / sprul 'tshong ma dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / bud med dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / yid la bya ba gzhan mang po skyed na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
343b1('bum): zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ bar chad bya ba'i phyir bdud sdig to can 'khrug par 'gyur ba nye bar
343b2('bum): sbyor te/ de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha
343b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ khe dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / chos gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang po byung la/ byang chub sems dpa'i
343b4('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ de dag gi ro myong bar byed na

344a4('bum): ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa ma yin no/ / rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs mi mkhas pa de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems te
344a5('bum): de la ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la thabs mkhas pa yang rgya cher bstan te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las kyang thabs mkhas pa rgya cher btsal bar bya'o// rab 'byor

350a1('bum): tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ chung snang gi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa/

350a3('bum): dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ chung che'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams

357a4('bum): 'du byed med do/ / rnam par shes pa med do// mig med do// rna ba med do// sna med do// lce med do// lus med do// yid med do// gzugs med do// sgra med do// dri med do// ro med do// reg
357a5('bum): med do/ / chos med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa med do// yid kyi rnam
357a6('bum): par shes pa med do/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med do// yid kyi
357a7('bum): 'jus te reg pa mang ngo / / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// lce'i 'dus te/
357b1('bum): / reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med do// sa'i khams med do// chu'i khams med do// me'i khams med
357b2('bum): do/ rlung gi khams med do// nam mkha'i khams med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams med do// ma rig pa med do// 'du byed med do// rnam par shes pa med do// ming dang gzugs med do// skye
357b3('bum): mched drug med do/ / reg pa med do// tshor ba med do// sred pa med do// len pa med do// srid pa med do// skye ba med do// rga shi med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do//
357b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// shes rab kyi pha rol
357b5('bum): tu phyin pa med do/ / nang stong pa nyid med do// phyi stong pa nyid med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med do// chen po stong pa nyid med do// doran dam pa stong pa nyid
357b6('bum): med do/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med do// thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
357b7('bum): med do/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med do// ngo dro
358a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid med do/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med
358a2('bum): do/ dbang po rnams med do// stobs rnams med do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med do// bsam gtan rnams
358a3('bum): med do/ / tshad med pa rnams med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do// rnam par thar pa brgyad med do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med do// rnam par thar pa'i
358a4('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med do// mngon par shes pa rnams med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams med do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
358a5('bum): bcu med do/ / mi 'jigs pa bzhi med do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi med do// byams pa chen po med do// snying rje chen po med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med do// rgyun
358a6('bum): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do// dgra bcom pa nyid med do// rang byang chub med do// thams cad shes pa nyid med

364a5('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa de la sangs rgyas med do/ / byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med do// nyan thos med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni

364a7('bum): chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / / gang la yang dag par spong ba rnams med pa de la sangs rgyas med do// byang chub sems dpa' med do// rang sangs rgyas med do// nyan thos med do// de ci'i
